welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# rank-card

Utility data structure used in Discord.js.

classes.name: RankCard
classes.description: A rank card, as used by Ayano!

params.name: input
params.description: The data for the rank card to initialise with

methods.name: calculateProgress
methods.description: Calculates the progress the progress bar should be at

methods.name: setBackground
methods.description: Sets the background of the rank card!

methods.name: setOverlay
methods.description: Sets the overlay of the rank card!

params.name: display
params.description: Whether the overlay should be displayed anymore

methods.name: setProgressBar
methods.description: Updates data about the progress bar's style!

params.name: rounded
params.description: Whether the progress bar should be rounded or not

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour to make the progress bar track!

params.name: fonts
params.description: The fonts to build the card with
